DOC.brief_summary: Feasibility clinical study evaluate safety effectiveness catheter system percutaneous creation arteriovenous fistula patient end stage renal disease require dialysis access .
DOC.criteria: Patients deem medically eligible AV fistula creation per institutional guideline and/or clinical judgment Patients diagnose chronic kidney disease classification stage IV V Adequate quality vein > = 2 mm confirm clinically significant outflow base preoperative assessment Adequate quality radial artery > = 2 mm base preoperative assessment Adequate collateral arterial perfusion Radial arteryadjacent vein proximity < = 1.5 mm Able provide inform consent Able travel institution follow examination Able intraoperatively place .014 '' guidewire artery Suspected skin disease Immunocompromised patient ( e.g . HIV positive ) Edema extremities Current diagnosis carcinoma Pregnancy currently breast feed Diagnosed hypercoaguable state Active infection Evidence vascular disease target site Preexisting vascular disease could confound study result Vessel tortuosity spasm prevent placement .014 '' guidewire
